Text: Bellport Academy is a historic school building located at Bellport in Suffolk County, New York.

1:
--------------------
Text: Bellport Academy:  It was built in 1833 as the village's first school and remodeled in 1919.

Text: Bellport Academy:  It is located within the Bellport Village Historic District.
